translation.en: ♪ Calling Gloria ♪
-All right, Vincent? -Never fucking better, Pete.
translation.ko: 잘 지내나, 빈센트? 빌어먹게 잘 지내지, 피트

translation.en: He knows.
Excluding the literal sense,
there are three types of wanker in this world.
translation.ko: 이 세상엔 3가지 유형의 재수 없는 놈이 있습니다

translation.en: There's the ones you pity, the sad, boring type of wanker
translation.ko: 먼저, 불쌍한 유형이 있어요 고문을 즐기는 듯한 인생에

translation.en: who life always seems to enjoy torturing. Not me.
-[horn honks] -[Vincent] See you later, Pete!
Then there's the irritating types of wanker,
translation.ko: 그리고 짜증 나는 유형의 재수 없는 놈들이 있습니다

translation.en: the ones whose only job in life is to stop the rest of us
translation.ko: 인생의 유일한 직업이 다른 사람들을 한평생 괴롭히는 사람들이에요

translation.en: enjoying our three score years and ten.
Again, not me.
[man] Excuse me, you can't park there, mate.
Finally, you have the show-offs, the posers.
The "I'm better than you, fuck everything and everyone twice" type of wankers.
translation.ko: '난 너보다 나아' '모두 엿 먹어 두 번씩 먹어'라고 외치는 재수 없는 놈들

translation.en: I prefer the term "ambitious,"
but whatever the label, we're the ones you'd better keep your eyes on.
translation.ko: 저는 '야심가'라는 호칭을 선호하지만 뭐라 불리든 여러분은 우리 같은 사람들을 조심해야 할 겁니다

translation.en: Good morning, arseholes!
Full disclosure. You're looking at a room of double-glazing salesmen.
translation.ko: 여러분께 공개하죠 이중 유리 회사의 영업팀 사무실입니다

translation.en: As this is 1983, we're not quite the social pariahs
you lot probably know and loathe, but give us time.
This is the Monday morning sales meeting,
translation.ko: 지금은 팀원들이 각자의 주간 주문서를 제출하는

translation.en: where the team hand in their weekly orders.
In theory, a small matter of financial housekeeping.
translation.ko: 이론적으로는 간단히 회사 가계부를 정리하는 시간인데

translation.en: In reality, a dick-swinging contest extraordinaire.
-Right, Fitzpatrick, what you got for me? -Oh, fuck off, I went first last week.
translation.ko: 피츠패트릭, 뭘 가져왔나? 꺼져, 지난주에도 제일 먼저 했잖아

translation.en: -Come on, it's Lavatory's turn. -Don't call me that.
All right, calm down, Lavatory, it's only a nickname.
No, a nickname is an affectionate term between mates.
translation.ko: 별명은 친구 사이일 때 부르는 애칭이야

translation.en: I think you're a massive prick, ergo not a nickname.
Yeah, well, I'll show you a massive prick.
[Vincent] This reprobate is Brian Fitzpatrick.
In life, deeply unlikeable, smarmy and charmless.
translation.ko: 정말 비호감 아첨꾼에 매력도 없는 인물이지만

translation.en: But give him something to sell and somehow he becomes transformed.
translation.ko: 팔아야 할 물건을 주면 희한하게도 변신을 합니다

translation.en: Strong?
President Reagan has a fallout shelter made entirely of our windows.
translation.ko: 레이건 대통령의 핵 방공호가 우리 창문으로만 만든 거예요

translation.en: Okay, the science tells us these uPVC window frames
translation.ko: 과학적으로 입증됐는데 uPVC 창틀은 인류가 멸망하고도 살아남는대요

translation.en: will be around long after the human race is extinct.
[Vincent] Also, the proud owner of a massive penis,
which he loves to unfurl at any given opportunity.
-And that's fine, is it? -[Fitzpatrick sniggering]
[Vincent] And this lovely man is Martin Lavender.
Honest, decent and well educated.
All qualities which, in our line of work, are as much use as an aerated condom.
translation.ko: 물론 이런 자질은 이 업계에서 공기가 잘 통하는 콘돔만큼 쓸모가 없지만요

translation.en: Hello, I'm Martin Lavender from Cachet Windows.
-Just eating dinner. -Nope, you have your dinner.
translation.ko: 저녁 식사 중이에요 그럼 식사 마저 하세요 다음에 들르겠습니다

translation.en: -I'll call back another day. -Thanks, love.
translation.ko: 그럼 식사 마저 하세요 다음에 들르겠습니다 고마워요

translation.en: [Vincent] Formerly a musician,
he quit his struggling band to join my sales team.
translation.ko: 무명 밴드를 그만두고 우리 영업팀에 합류했죠

translation.en: [Vincent] Unfortunately, three months later, his now ex-band
landed the biggest number-one single of the year with "Wherever I Lay My Hat."
♪ Wherever I lay my hat, that's my home ♪
[Vincent] Naturally, we rallied around to help him through this difficult period.
translation.ko: 물론 저희는 그가 이 힘든 시기를 잘 이겨내도록 응원했죠

translation.en: Ehhh!
[Fitzpatrick] Unlucky, mate, could've been you!
translation.ko: 운도 없지 네가 될 수 있었는데

translation.en: Right, come on, look, I wanna see some orders. Don't be shy, Lavender.
translation.ko: 좋아, 주문서 좀 보자고 부끄러워하지 마, 라벤더

translation.en: His mother wasn't.
-Four. -[Fitzpatrick] Bollocks.
Four thousand. Gotta be a personal best for you.
Could've been seven if this snake hadn't undercut me on Warren Close.
translation.ko: 이 자식이 워런 클로스한테 싸게 팔지만 않았어도 7이었어

translation.en: You're having a laugh. There's nothing wrong with my prices.
translation.ko: 웃기고 있네 내 가격이 아니라 네가 문제지

translation.en: It's just you. You couldn't sell ice to a bloody Eskimo.
translation.ko: 망할 에스키모한테 얼음도 못 팔 녀석

translation.en: But Eskimos don't need ice. Why would I sell it to them?
translation.ko: 에스키모는 얼음이 필요 없는데 내가 왜 파냐?

translation.en: You know, because of the saying, "he could sell ice to the Eskimos."
-You're the fucking opposite, in't ya? -Yeah, that's not how opposites work.
translation.ko: 넌 빌어먹을 그 정반대잖아 정반대는 그런 게 아니야

translation.en: [whispers] I get a lot of this.
All right then, you couldn't sell food to a starving Ethiopian,
translation.ko: 그럼 이렇게 하자, 눈에 파리 꼬이고 배가 불룩하게 굶어가는

translation.en: with flies round his eyes and pot belly, shit up his legs.
translation.ko: 에티오피아 사람한테 음식도 못 팔 거잖아

translation.en: I'd just give him some food. I'm not a monster.
translation.ko: 그냥 음식을 주면 되지 내가 괴물도 아니고

translation.en: Which is why I will always outsell you in any sales environment.
translation.ko: 바로 그래서 내가 어떤 영업 환경에서도 널 이긴다는 거야

translation.en: So you reckon you could sell ice to the Eskimos?
translation.ko: 그래서 네가 에스키모한테 얼음을 팔 수 있다고 생각해?

translation.en: Not only sell it to 'em. By the time I'd left their igloo,
translation.ko: 팔기만 하겠어? 내가 이글루를 떠날 때쯤이면

translation.en: they'd be asking me to be godfather to their adorable slanty-eyed kids.
translation.ko: 그 쌍꺼풀 없는 애들의 대부가 되어 달라고 할걸

translation.en: Tell me, is it only lazy cultural stereotypes
translation.ko: 그런 낡은 문화적 선입견만 팔아먹는 거야, 아니면

translation.en: you sell to, or real people too?
Well, unlike Professor No-Nuts over there, I can sell anything to anyone.
translation.ko: 저기 별 볼 일 없는 샌님과 다르게 난 아무한테나 뭐든 팔 수 있어

translation.en: So taking the "ice and Eskimos" analogy, you reckon you could sell new windows
translation.ko: 에스키모랑 얼음 비유에 따르면 최근에 새 창문을 판 사람한테

translation.en: to someone you've recently sold new windows to?
translation.ko: 또 새 창문을 팔 수 있다는 얘기야?

translation.en: -Yes. -I've got a tonne says you can't.
You had a tonne.
You might as well hand over those notes now, Lavatory.
Right, if you bucks are done rutting, I want to see some orders. Brian.
translation.ko: 지랄 끝났으면 주문서 좀 보자 브라이언?

translation.en: Thirteen five.
[Vincent whistles] Impressive.
Who would have thought a weasely fucker with terrible BO like you
could charm the life savings out of anyone?
translation.ko: 사람들 노후 자금을 꼬신다고 누가 생각이냐 했겠냐

translation.en: Well, here's mine.
Just the 17k.
Which makes me employee of the fucking century.
But don't feel too bad about it, boys, it's still a record week.
translation.ko: 하지만 너무 실망하진 마 다들 최고 기록의 한 주였어

translation.en: And to celebrate, I've lined up a special treat for us all on Saturday night.
translation.ko: 자축하기 위해서 토요일 밤에 특별 파티를 준비했지

translation.en: Now, let's get out there.
These windows aren't gonna sell them-fucking-selves.
translation.ko: 이 망할 창문들은 스스로 팔리지 않으니까

translation.en: Morning, Vincent.
Morning, Carol. Dig out the address for the Solomon house.
translation.ko: 솔로몬 씨 집 주소 좀 알아봐 줄래?

translation.en: I've got time to pop by later.
Guess who...
The last time I saw these beautiful fingers,
translation.ko: 이 아름다운 손가락을 마지막으로 본 건

translation.en: they were wrapped around my...
-...has got the kids with them? -My neck.
They were wrapped around my neck.
-My fault for farting in bed, eh, Sam? -That's not what you were gonna say.
translation.ko: 침대에서 방귀 뀐 잘못으로 - 그 말 하려던 게 아니잖아 - 뭐라고 하려고 했는데?

translation.en: -What was he gonna say? -Nothing. Go and play outside.
translation.ko: - 그 말 하려던 게 아니잖아 - 뭐라고 하려고 했는데? 아무것도 아냐, 나가 놀아

translation.en: -Go on, I want a word with your dad. -Hello, baby.
translation.ko: 아빠랑 얘기 좀 하고 갈게 안녕, 자기

translation.en: Oh, I know. Incredible, isn't she?
What's up?
I thought Cachet's number-one salesman might like some lunch.
translation.ko: 카셰의 1등 영업 사원이 점심을 원할 것 같아서

translation.en: It's only cheese, but I swiped a Penguin
translation.ko: 치즈만 있지만 특별히 로비 도시락통에서 펭귄을 슬쩍했어

translation.en: from Robbie's school dinner tin as a treat.
I do not deserve an angel like you in my life.
I know.
What time are you home? I'm doing a curry.
translation.ko: 그래서 오늘 언제 들어와? 저녁은 카레야

translation.en: Can't do tonight, I've got house calls to make.
You are joking. This is the third night this week.
Sam, honey.
The best time to close a deal is when the husband and wife are both there.
translation.ko: 영업하기 가장 좋은 시간은 부부가 함께 있을 때야

translation.en: Evenings, weekends, these are the golden hours.
And when do you plan on fitting us into your hectic schedule, then? Christmas?
translation.ko: 그 바쁘신 일정에 가족은 언제 끼워 넣으려고? 크리스마스? 공휴일?

translation.en: Bank holidays?
I'm trying to build something for us here.
In a few months, I'll ease off, but not right now.
translation.ko: 몇 달 후면 여유로워질 거야 근데 지금은 아냐

translation.en: I'll make it up to you, gorgeous. I promise.
You realise there is no part of this I cannot see?
-What are you doing? -Don't worry.
translation.ko: 뭐 하는 거야? 걱정하지 마 내가 알아서 갈게

translation.en: -I'm obviously not wanted here. -Sam. Come back.
translation.ko: 걱정하지 마 내가 알아서 갈게 샘, 돌아와

translation.en: Sam, come back! Ignore her, she's mental.
"Thanks for rescuing me, Carol" might be nice.
[Vincent] Meanwhile, it hadn't taken Fitzpatrick long
to find a 73 year-old Eskimo to sell ice to.
But you only put these windows in three weeks ago.
I know, Mrs. Brown. I'm embarrassed to be here.
But it's only just come to light that there is a major design flaw
translation.ko: 그 창문의 플라스틱 틀에서 아무도 예상치 못한

translation.en: in the plastic frames of those windows that no one could have foreseen.
The white bits? Yeah, the white bits.
translation.ko: - 그 하얀 부분요? - 네, 하얀 부분요

translation.en: See, they're made from a plastic compound called
translation.ko: 그게 경질 폴리염화비닐이란 플라스틱 화합물로 만들어져요

translation.en: un-plasticised poly vinyl chloride, or uPVC for short.
translation.ko: 그게 경질 폴리염화비닐이란 플라스틱 화합물로 만들어져요 줄여서 uPVC라고 하죠

translation.en: We've only just discovered that when exposed to sunlight,
translation.ko: 근데 얼마 전에야 밝혀진 게 햇빛에 노출되면 그런 종류의

translation.en: that type of plastic might explode.
-Oh, no. -Oh no, indeed.
But it's not all bad news.
Have you heard of NASA?
The space people?
They're the ones.
Now, as part of the Space Shuttle program,
they have developed a far superior plastic compound,
translation.ko: 그 사람들이 훨씬 좋은 플라스틱 화합물을 발명했어요

translation.en: one that won't kill you.
Does it have a name?
Yep, it's called PVCu.
So, what I would like to do is exchange these dangerous uPVC windows
translation.ko: 그래서 제가 제안드리는 건 위험한 uPVC 창문들을

translation.en: for nice, new, safe PVCu ones, free of charge, apart from installation costs.
translation.ko: 안전한 새 PVCu로 무료로 바꿔드리는 겁니다 설치비만 빼고요

translation.en: Ooh, I don't know. I should probably ask my son about that.
translation.ko: 글쎄요, 아들한테 물어봐야 할 것 같아요

translation.en: Is your son Neil Armstrong?
No.
Then I don't think he's qualified to help us.
translation.ko: 그럼 아마 도움을 못 주실 거예요

translation.en: Read it and weep.
The whole house? How have you done that?
You know, sales acumen, charm. Oh no, wait, you don't know, do you?
translation.ko: 영업 재능인 매력이지 잘 모르겠구나, 그렇지?

translation.en: Now, come on, you owe me a tonne.
Hold on, you've only charged her a hundred quid for fitting.
Have you given her a house full of free windows to win a bet?
translation.ko: 내기에 이기기 위해서 무료로 새 창문을 해준 거야?

translation.en: Lavatory... The word "free" is not in my vocabulary.
Just like the phrase "I've had a number-one hit" is not in yours.
translation.ko: '난 히트곡을 불렀어'가 네 사전에 없듯이 말이야

translation.en: No, I've got a fitter coming tomorrow to rip out those windows
translation.ko: 내일 설치 기사가 와서 저 창문들을 뜯어내고

translation.en: and pop the very same ones straight back in again.
translation.ko: 똑같은 창문들을 그대로 다시 끼울 거야

translation.en: The old bag'll never know.
So not only have I sold ice to the Eskimos,
I've sold them their own fucking ice. I'm a genius.
translation.ko: 갖고 있던 얼음을 판 거지 난 천재야! 얼른 돈 줘

translation.en: Come on, pay up.
Oh, yes, there we go. Ooh, num-num-num-num.
Unlike Fitzpatrick, I don't need to use the dark arts to close a deal.
translation.ko: 피츠패트릭과 다르게 전 어둠의 마법을 써서 영업하진 않죠

translation.en: Good morning, Mr. Solomon. Vincent from Cachet Windows.
translation.ko: 솔로몬 씨 좋은 아침입니다 카셰 창문의 빈센트예요

translation.en: We spoke on the phone earlier.
Ah, Mr. Vincent, yes.
Look, I'm so sorry, but we're about to sit down for prayer.
Maybe you can leave some brochures and we can phone you about prices tomorrow?
translation.ko: 책자 몇 개 두고 가시면 내일 가격에 대해 전화할게요

translation.en: Wanna know the percentage who sleep on it and call you back? A big fat fucking zero.
translation.ko: 더 생각해보고 다시 연락 주는 사람들의 비율이 궁금해요? 망할 0퍼센트입니다

translation.en: This may sound odd, but may I join?
It's been a spiritually exhausting last few days for me.
Eh... Well, we'd be delighted. Come in.
One more thing...
Salesmen are like vampires... never invite one into your home.
translation.ko: 참, 영업 사원은 뱀파이어예요 절대 집으로 초청하지 마세요

translation.en: Once you do, we won't leave your side until we taste blood, not even for a piss.
translation.ko: 들어가면 피를 맛볼 때까지 곁을 떠나지 않아요 오줌 싸려고도 안 가죠

translation.en: -Thank you! -Oh, no problem.
The peace...
[Vincent] Using a homeowner's loo is a cardinal sin,
translation.ko: 집주인의 화장실을 사용하는 건 심각한 죄입니다

translation.en: no matter how desperate you are.
The second you leave those poor bastards alone,
they'll try to conspire a way to get you out of their house.
translation.ko: 그들은 당신을 집에서 내쫓을 방안을 궁리할 거예요

translation.en: You need to get the kids to bed?
That's okay, I'll give you a hand with bath time.
translation.ko: 아이들을 재워야 한다고요? 괜찮아요 제가 씻기는 걸 도와드릴게요

translation.en: Your husband is having a heart attack?
Let me run you both down to A&E, you lying shit-bags.
These God-fearing fuckers have been praying for almost two hours.
translation.ko: 경건한 이 인간들은 벌써 2시간째 기도 중입니다

translation.en: And it's not just world peace shit, either.
[woman] Lord, please use thy divine power
to find a good cash buyer for Brian and Kellie's car.
translation.ko: 브라이언과 캘리의 차를 현금으로 살 사람을 구해주세요

translation.en: Dear merciful Lord, please do what you can
to get a better reception for Aggy's TV.
translation.ko: 아기의 텔레비전 수신 상태가 좋아지게 도와주소서

translation.en: Dear Lord, please give me the strength
translation.ko: 하나님, 이렇게 시간 낭비하는 개자식들 앞에서

translation.en: not to piss my pants in front of these time-wasting sons of bitches.
translation.ko: 하나님, 이렇게 시간 낭비하는 개자식들 앞에서 바지에 오줌을 싸지 않게 힘을 주세요

translation.en: Eventually my bladder's prayers were answered
translation.ko: 결국 제 방광의 기도는 응답을 받았고

translation.en: and Mr. Solomon signed for a full house of windows.
translation.ko: 솔로몬 씨는 집 전체 창문을 계약하셨죠

translation.en: It's safe to say I eat, sleep, breathe, shit and piss...
translation.ko: 제가 먹고, 자고, 숨 쉬고 똥오줌 싸는 것까지

translation.en: [sighs] sales.
But like Einstein, my true genius wasn't spotted until later in life.
translation.ko: 아인슈타인처럼 제 진짜 천재성은 좀 늦게 발견됐습니다

translation.en: ♪ Hit me with your rhythm stick ♪
[Vincent] So after spending a couple of grand
having this fucking mutt's back legs amputated
translation.ko: 절단하고 바퀴를 다는 데 수천 파운드를 쓰고

translation.en: and wheels put on it, he takes it out for its first walk
translation.ko: 절단하고 바퀴를 다는 데 수천 파운드를 쓰고 처음으로 산책하러 나갔는데 이 개새끼가 혼비백산이 되더니

translation.en: and the fucking dog panics and rolls straight under a bus.
translation.ko: 처음으로 산책하러 나갔는데 이 개새끼가 혼비백산이 되더니 버스 밑으로 굴러간 거야

translation.en: Poor bastard is devastated.
I told him to look on the bright side... At least now you got a 2,000 pound rug.
Yeah, this is him.
Fuck.
Now, that was a call informing me that while I'd been otherwise engaged,
a super tanker on the Thames estuary had been accidentally loaded
translation.ko: 템스강 어귀의 초대형 유조선에 오염된 원유가 실수로 실렸다는 전화였습니다

translation.en: with contaminated crude oil.
Unfortunately, the constant monitoring required to prevent
such million-pound fuck-ups was my one and only job.
translation.ko: 이런 몇백만 파운드짜리 실수를 방지하는 것이 제 임무였죠

translation.en: Upon careful reflection,
you are to be relieved of all duties with immediate effect.
translation.ko: 당신을 해고하는 바이고 그 효력은 즉시 발휘됩니다

translation.en: Do you have anything to say for the record, Mr. Swan?
translation.ko: 혹시 더 하실 말씀 있나요 스완 씨?

translation.en: -This is fucking ridiculous. -Maybe we should take a break.
translation.ko: 젠장 말도 안 돼요 잠깐 쉬는 시간을 가질게요

translation.en: Listen, I've spoken to the boys,
they're ready to walk out for you on this one, Vince.
translation.ko: 다들 자네를 위해서 나설 준비가 되어있어, 빈스

translation.en: I appreciate the support of the Union on this, Terry, but I'm jacking it in.
translation.ko: 조합의 도움은 고마워요, 테리 그렇지만 그만둘래요

translation.en: -[Terry scoffs] -I fucking hate this job anyway.
How are you gonna provide for Sam and the kids?
I'll figure something out.
Oi, you two, the charisma twins.
Upon careful reflection, I've decided you can stick your job up your arses.
translation.ko: 심사숙고 끝에 제가 당신들이랑 회사에 엿을 먹이기로 결정했습니다

translation.en: Here's my notice of resignation.
I couldn't face going home to tell Sam I'd lost my job.
translation.ko: 집에 가서 샘한테 직장을 잃었다고 말할 수 없었어요

translation.en: I said I'd figure something out, and that's what I intended to do,
translation.ko: 방법을 찾을 거라고 했고 당연히 찾을 거지만

translation.en: right after I got absolutely rat-arsed.
Hmm. I never was a whiskey drinker.
Fuck me. Vincent Swan.
Dicky Cox?
Dicky Dip Shits, I think you used to call me at school.
translation.ko: 디키 굼벵이라고 학생 땐 불렀던 것 같은데

translation.en: -Cox by name, cock by nature. -Yeah, that was another one.
translation.ko: 이름은 콕스, 천성은 꼴통 그것도 있었지

translation.en: -You all right, Vince? You look like shit. -No. No, I'm not all right, Dicky.
translation.ko: 괜찮나, 빈센트? 안 좋아 보여 아니, 안 괜찮아, 디키

translation.en: I got sacked this morning and now I'm crying next to a urinal
translation.ko: 아침에 해고당해서 지금은 내 구토가 가득한 변기 옆에서 울면서 너랑 얘기하잖아

translation.en: full of my own puke, talking to you.
translation.ko: 지금은 내 구토가 가득한 변기 옆에서 울면서 너랑 얘기하잖아

translation.en: No offence, but I think I just hit rock bottom.
I mean, it's funny how life turns out, innit?
Who'd have put money on me being the bloody successful one,
and you, Vincent Swan, being such a fucking loser?
translation.ko: 빈센트 스완이 실패자가 될 거라 누가 예상했겠어?

translation.en: Cheers for the pep talk, Coxy.
Yeah.
Vincent, what would you say if I told you
translation.ko: 빈센트, 내가 지난주에만 네 월급의 4배를 벌었다면

translation.en: I earned four times as much as your monthly wage in the last week?
I'd say, unless the demand for creepy-looking gigolos
translation.ko: 무섭게 생긴 남창들에 대한 수요가 갑자기 오른 것이

translation.en: has gone through the roof, that's bollocks.
Yeah, funny.
Here...
Have a chuckle at that.
Plus, I've got something else that could interest you.
translation.ko: 네 관심을 끌 만한 게 또 있지

translation.en: What I've got in here might just change your life.
I'm not a complete fucking yokel, I've done coke before.
translation.ko: 나 촌뜨기 아니야 코카인은 해 봤다고

translation.en: I'm not talking about the drugs.
-[chuckles] -A lump of fucking plastic?
Is it? Or...
translation.ko: - 이 망할 플라스틱 조각? - 그런가? 백금이 아니고?

translation.en: is it white gold?
-No, it's definitely a lump of plastic. -Oh, to the uninitiated.
translation.ko: 플라스틱 조각 맞는데 모르는 사람한테나 그렇지

translation.en: But you add some know-how and some bullshit,
translation.ko: 노하우 조금이랑 과장만 조금 보탤 수 있으면

translation.en: and this lump of fucking plastic turns into something far more eye-catching.
translation.ko: 이 망할 플라스틱 조각이 엄청난 거로 변한다고

translation.en: [Vincent] Coxy laid out the double-glazing business for me.
translation.ko: 콕시는 제게 이중 유리 사업을 소개했습니다

translation.en: Since Thatcher handed us the right to buy your council house, the world and his wife
translation.ko: 대처 총리가 우리에게 임대 주택을 살 권리를 주고 난 후 모두 새로 산 꿈의 집을

translation.en: were madly renovating their newly owned dream homes.
White gold was just plastic, a cheap alternative to timber,
translation.ko: 백금은 그냥 목재의 저렴한 대안인 플라스틱이었지만

translation.en: but it brought the cost of making brand-new windows down to peanuts.
translation.ko: 새로운 창문을 만드는 가격을 껌으로 만들었죠

translation.en: Coxy would then sell them on with a 600% mark-up.
For those that couldn't afford the astronomical prices,
translation.ko: 천문학적인 가격을 감당하지 못 하는 사람들에겐

translation.en: he'd sell them finance.
That way they could pay back what they thought they could afford each month
translation.ko: 그렇게 그들은 남은 인생의 평생에 걸쳐 매달 조금씩의 돈을 내는 겁니다

translation.en: for the rest of their natural lives.
translation.ko: 평생에 걸쳐 매달 조금씩의 돈을 내는 겁니다

translation.en: Eventually those shiny new windows would cost more
than their dreary former council houses.
translation.ko: 황량한 임대 주택보다 더 비싸지는 거죠

translation.en: It was beautiful.
I want this.
Oh. You can have it. No, not this.
I mean meeting you. Losing my job. Everything.
translation.ko: 널 만난 것 직장을 잃는 것

translation.en: This happened for a reason.
You ain't gonna cry again, are you?
You always were a fucking dip shit.
[Vincent] My fate was sealed the very next day.
translation.ko: 제 운명은 바로 다음 날 확정되었습니다

translation.en: I'm not a big believer in kismet,
translation.ko: 운명론자는 아니지만 이 운명의 손짓을 지나치려면

translation.en: but you'd have to be blind, deaf and dumb as shit not to hear destiny calling me.
translation.ko: 운명론자는 아니지만 이 운명의 손짓을 지나치려면 장님이거나 귀머거리거나 정말 멍청했어야 했어요
"빈센트, 넌 재능을 타고났고 이 일은 네 운명이다"

translation.en: Sorry to interrupt.
It's an elephant, it's not male genitalia.
-I'm looking for the owner. -Sorry, I'm new here.
translation.ko: 여기 사장님을 뵈러 왔는데요 - 죄송해요, 제가 신입이라 - 네

translation.en: Right. Is the owner around?
Like I said, I'm new, so I literally can't help you.
translation.ko: 말씀드렸듯이 제가 새로 와서 도와드릴 수가 없어요

translation.en: Fuck me, Carol. You're a receptionist.
Just take some details, will you?
It doesn't hurt to be careful, Tony. He's just wandered in off the street.
translation.ko: 조심해서 나쁠 거 없잖아요 토니 그냥 어슬렁거리다 들어왔다고요

translation.en: This is a fucking showroom.
We want people to wander in off the street.
Hello, sir, I take it this is your business?
-You've got two minutes, pal. -For what?
To sell me whatever the fuck it is you're selling and then fuck off.
translation.ko: 네가 파는 게 뭐든 팔아 보고 썩 꺼져

translation.en: [Vincent] Meet Tony Walsh, the world's angriest small business owner.
translation.ko: 토니 월시입니다 세상에서 가장 화난 자영업자죠

translation.en: No, I don't want to sell to you, I want to sell for you. My name's Vincent.
translation.ko: 사장님께가 아니라 사장님을 위해 팔려고요, 빈센트입니다

translation.en: I don't care if it's Barbra Streisand. I've already got a sales team.
translation.ko: 당신이 바브라 스트라이샌드여도 상관없어 난 이미 영업팀이 있다고

translation.en: Well, that was succinct. Now we've got 90 seconds to fill with small talk.
translation.ko: 금방 끝났네요 남은 90초 동안 수다나 떨죠

translation.en: -Or you could just fuck off early. -Right. And where's the fun in that?
translation.ko: 그냥 빨리 꺼져도 되고 그렇죠 근데 그게 무슨 재밉니까

translation.en: You see that couple? They walked in your showroom four minutes ago.
translation.ko: 저기 커플 보이시죠? 전시실로 4분 전에 들어왔는데

translation.en: In another 45 seconds, they're gonna walk out, along with thousands in lost revenue.
translation.ko: 45초 내로 여기서 나갈 거고 그건 수천 파운드의 손실입니다

translation.en: I've got twenty quid that says Tweedle Dum and Tweedle Dee over there
translation.ko: 저기 트위들디랑 트위들덤이 그때까지도 가만히 있는다에

translation.en: will still be scratching their arses when they walk out.
All right, pal, here's a price list.
You sign them up, I'll give you a two-week trial.
-I hear congratulations are in order! -Eh, sorry?
The Centennial Customer Award? No one told you?
translation.ko: - 네? - 100번째 손님 상요 잠깐, 아무도 말 안 했어요?

translation.en: As our hundredth customer today, you've won the opportunity
translation.ko: 오늘 100번째 손님으로서 댁의 집을 카셰 창문과 문을 위한 견본 주택으로

translation.en: to turn your house into a show-home for the Cachet range of windows and doors.
translation.ko: 댁의 집을 카셰 창문과 문을 위한 견본 주택으로 만들 기회를 얻으셨어요

translation.en: -My name's Vincent, nice to meet you. -Hi, I'm Mark. This is my wife Lorna.
translation.ko: 빈센트입니다, 만나서 반가워요 - 저는 마크고 아내 로나예요 - 안녕하세요

translation.en: Hello. Wow, we've never won anything before.
translation.ko: - 저는 마크고 아내 로나예요 - 안녕하세요 뭐가 당첨된 게 처음이에요

translation.en: Well, I guess some people are born lucky
and the rest of us just have to make do with good looks and charm, eh?
translation.ko: 나머지는 그냥 외모랑 매력으로 살아남아야 하나 봐요

translation.en: So tell me, Mark, Lorna, why are you looking for new windows?
translation.ko: 마크와 로나 씨 왜 새 창문을 찾고 계시나요?

translation.en: [Vincent] Ten minutes of bullshit later, and I was ready to seal the deal.
translation.ko: 10분 간의 헛소리 끝에 저는 거래를 성사시킬 준비가 되었죠

translation.en: All of our products come with safety glass fitted as standard.
translation.ko: 저희 모든 제품은 기본적으로 안전유리를 장착합니다

translation.en: Now, I'd imagine those little boys of yours are
always keep you on your toes, right, Lorna? Always darting about?
Now imagine them running full pelt into a plate glass window.
translation.ko: 애들이 단단한 유리 창문으로 전력 질주한다고 상상해보세요

translation.en: It turned out that not all of our products came with safety glass fitted as standard.
translation.ko: 저희 제품들이 다 안전유리를 기본 장착하지는 않았더라고요

translation.en: It's probably hard, at this point,
translation.ko: 아마 지금으로선 소중한 아드님께서 피 흘리며 누워있는

translation.en: not to picture your precious offspring lying in a pool of their own blood.
translation.ko: 아마 지금으로선 소중한 아드님께서 피 흘리며 누워있는 모습을 떠올릴 수밖에 없겠지만

translation.en: But hold onto that thought, because this, Lorna, pardon my French,
this disgraceful piece of shit
is a well-known national company's patio door.
I can't say who. [whispering] Everest.
Christ, it makes me angry. Doesn't anyone ever think of the children?
translation.ko: 정말 절 화나게 하죠 우리 아이들을 위한 건 없는지

translation.en: Well, thankfully, here at Cachet, we do.
Maybe it was the adrenaline in everybody's systems,
but by the time I'd finished, they'd signed for five grand's worth of windows.
translation.ko: 제가 말을 끝마쳤을 때 그들은 5,000파운드어치 창문을 계약했습니다

translation.en: The second I left the showroom, Walshy called his wife.
translation.ko: 제가 전시실을 떠난 순간 월시는 아내에게 전화했죠

translation.en: I think I've just met the man who's going to make us our first million.
translation.ko: 첫 100만 파운드를 찍게 해줄 사람을 방금 만난 것 같아

translation.en: [Vincent] He was so impressed, he didn't offer me a trial.
translation.ko: 그는 너무 감동한 나머지 제게 수습직이 아니라

translation.en: He put me in charge of his entire sales team,
who I promptly sacked.
Tweedle Dee and Tweedle Dum went out the door and in came Tweedle Dumb and Dumber.
translation.ko: 트위들디와 트위들덤이 나가자 덤 앤 더머가 등장했습니다

translation.en: And after Fitzpatrick and Lavender graduated
from the Vincent Swan School of Sales, my team was complete.
translation.ko: 빈센트 스완의 영업 학교를 졸업하고 제 영업팀은 완성됐죠

translation.en: Once Walsh's tasteless decor had been replaced with something more befitting
translation.ko: 월시의 흉한 장식들을 우리 회사에 맞는 세련된 장식들로 대체되고 난 후

translation.en: of a classy operation like ours, Cachet Windows was reborn.
translation.ko: 우리 회사에 맞는 세련된 장식들로 대체되고 난 후 카셰 창문은 재탄생했죠

translation.en: Right!
First and only rule... We don't rip off anyone in our town.
translation.ko: 동네 사람들에겐 바가지 가격이 없다는 게 유일한 규칙이다

translation.en: These are our neighbours, our friends.
We always sell our windows at one price, a fair price.
translation.ko: 같은 가격, 공정한 가격에 창문을 파는 거지

translation.en: Sometimes over, sometimes under, but always at one price.
translation.ko: 때로는 높고 때론 낮겠지만 항상 같은 가격이지

translation.en: Sorry, so who pays more?
Dick heads. The terminally stupid.
-And less? -Well, no one, if we can help it.
translation.ko: 덜 내는 건? 아무도 없으면 좋겠지

translation.en: So, it's not really one price for all, is it?
No. But... it sounds good, doesn't it?
And that pretty much brings us up to speed.
Wanna know the greatest thing about winning at life?
translation.ko: 인생 승리의 가장 좋은 점을 알고 싶으세요?

translation.en: It's that you get to give a little something back.
Hello, Vince.
-Terry. How's tricks? -Yeah, good. You coming in?
translation.ko: - 반갑네, 빈스 - 테리, 잘 있었어요? 잘 있었지, 들어올래?

translation.en: I really appreciate the offer, mate, but double-glazing salesman?
translation.ko: 제안은 고맙지만... 이중 유리 영업 사원?

translation.en: I mean, no offence, but it's not really me, is it?
translation.ko: 악의는 없지만 - 그냥 나랑 안 맞아서 - 왜 안 맞죠?

translation.en: I know the refinery's not everyone's cup of tea, but it's steady,
translation.ko: 모두가 정유소를 좋아하는 건 아니지만 안정적이고, 연금도 좋고 해고당하기도 사실 불가능하지

translation.en: the pension's good, it's practically impossible to get sacked.
translation.ko: 안정적이고, 연금도 좋고 해고당하기도 사실 불가능하지

translation.en: Yeah, maybe for mere mortals.
-Hello, stranger. -[Vincent] Evening, Gillian.
At last, the brains of the house have arrived.
I'd better run, I'm on nights.
You'll have to bring the family over for a barbecue soon, Vince.
translation.ko: 조만간 식구들 데리고 와서 바비큐나 먹자, 빈스

translation.en: -Yeah, they'd love that, mate. -[Terry] Bye, love.
Ta, darling.
Try not to masturbate through your entire shift.
translation.ko: 근무 시간 동안 자위나 안 해 보려고 해 봐요

translation.en: Someone's got to sit in that chair after you.
[Gillian] You're not running out on me too, are you, Vincent?
It's been ages since we've had a little gossip.
Would I ever. Stick the kettle on.
So, uh, Terry said you're a salesman now.
Yeah, I finally found a job
where being a self-aggrandising ponce is considered a plus.
So, what is it you sell?
-Double glazing. -[Gillian] Fancy.
translation.ko: - 그래서 뭘 팔아? - 이중 유리요 멋지다

translation.en: I quite like them patio doors.
I bet they're expensive, though.
Oh, you'd be surprised, Gillian.
I know this looks bad, but those patio doors are gonna completely revolutionise
translation.ko: 안 좋아 보이겠지만 미닫이문이 이 집의 아래층부터 정원까지의

translation.en: the flow from their downstairs to their garden.
What? This is what I do.
Cachet Windows and Doors.
It's Brendan for you.
Just tell him I've nipped out.
Hang on a minute, he's just here, Brendan.
Hello, Brendan.
Yeah. But they're the same fucking ones.
No. Look. I'm coming over.
-I told you to tell him I'd nipped out. -I don't know what that means.
translation.ko: 바람 쐬러 갔다고 하랬잖아요 그게 무슨 뜻인지 몰라요

translation.en: Is it an Essex thing?
-[Vincent] It's all put together... -Oi. What the hell is this, Vincent?
I'm about 90% sure that's an order for patio doors, Terry, am I right?
translation.ko: 미닫이문 주문서라고 90퍼센트 확신해요, 테리 맞나요? 뒤에 가서 얘기하시죠

translation.en: Do you wanna talk about this out back? Do excuse us for a moment.
translation.ko: 맞나요? 뒤에 가서 얘기하시죠 - 실례 좀 하겠습니다 - 계속하게

translation.en: No, I'm not stopping.
I just came to tell you we don't want your shitty windows.
translation.ko: 네 병신같은 창문 필요 없다고 말하러 온 것뿐이야

translation.en: Well, maybe you should talk to your wife once in a while
because she seemed positively thrilled by the idea.
And they're precision engineered, not shitty.
translation.ko: 그리고 정밀 공정이에요 병신 같지 않다고요

translation.en: Now if that's all, I'm busy with customers.
No, don't try and worm your way out of it. You took advantage of Gill.
translation.ko: 구렁이처럼 빠져나가려고 하네 너는 질을 이용했어

translation.en: I don't know if you've realised, mate, but Gill's a grown woman now,
with tits and everything. And this, this is a contract,
translation.ko: 가슴이랑 다 있는 성인요 그리고 이건 계약이고 법적 효력을 가지고 있어요

translation.en: and it's legally binding. So I suggest you go home and take it up...
translation.ko: 그리고 이건 계약이고 법적 효력을 가지고 있어요 그러니 집에 가셔서...

translation.en: Now you stay away from me, my wife and my windows, you utter scumbag.
translation.ko: 나랑 내 아내, 우리 집 창문 근처에도 오지 마 쓰레기야

translation.en: [Vincent] Fuck.
Sorry. Sometimes working here is like being in a really shit version of Dallas.
translation.ko: 죄송해요 여기서 일하는 건 가끔 구린 버전의 '댈러스' 같아요

translation.en: Vincent. Look, he's not here. He's on a shift.
translation.ko: 빈센트 그이는 지금 여기 없어 근무 나갔어

translation.en: Yeah, I know. Look, I came to say sorry.
I'm not gonna make you honour the contract.
We all right?
Yeah.
Good, because while I've been standing here freezing my nuts off,
translation.ko: - 응 - 좋아요 왜냐하면 여기 추위에 떨면서

translation.en: I couldn't help thinking this conversation
translation.ko: 서 있는 동안 만약 이곳이 예쁜 이중 유리 발코니였다면

translation.en: would have been much more comfortable in a beautiful double-glazed porch.
translation.ko: 만약 이곳이 예쁜 이중 유리 발코니였다면 우리 대화가 훨씬 편했을 거란 생각을 계속했거든요

translation.en: You always did know how to make me laugh, Vincent Swan.
translation.ko: 당신은 항상 날 웃게 하는 방법을 알았지, 빈센트 스완

translation.en: Interesting place for a personalised number plate.
I quite like it.
Fancy a spin?
Oooh, yeah, I've never been in a wanker-mobile before.
translation.ko: 그래, 재수 없는 놈 차는 처음이니까

translation.en: I'll get me coat. ♪♪
Like I told you, page one of the training manual...
Never leave the house without closing the deal.
translation.ko: 거래를 성사시키기 전에는 절대 집을 떠나지 말아라

translation.en: Hmm, yeah, it's tricky to see the difference, myself.
What exactly is it you don't like, Mrs. Brown?
translation.ko: 뭐가 특히 마음에 안 드세요 브라운 부인?

translation.en: They remind me of death. I want my old new windows back.
translation.ko: 죽음을 연상시켜요 옛날 창문을 다시 돌려주세요

translation.en: Right, well, I could get Brendan to re-fit the old ones, but, I mean,
translation.ko: 브렌던한테 옛날 창문을 다시 끼우라고 할 순 있는데... 또 돈을 내셔야 하잖아요

translation.en: you'll be paying to replace these
with an identical and, frankly, inferior product.
translation.ko: 거의 비슷한데 더 안 좋은 제품으로 바꾸시려고요

translation.en: I'm going to call my son. You can talk to him about it.
Oh, no, no, don't do that, Mrs. Brown. I'll tell you what...
I'll get Brendan to replace the windows for free.
translation.ko: 브렌던한테 무료로 다시 끼워 달라고 할게요

translation.en: -I'm sure he won't mind. -You're a lovely young man, Brian.
translation.ko: 신경 안 쓸 거예요 정말 사랑스러운 젊은이네요 브라이언

translation.en: Yes, he will fucking mind. I've got another job on.
translation.ko: 아니, 완전 신경 쓸 건데 또 일이 있다고

translation.en: How do I get this through that thick Paddy skull of yours?
translation.ko: 그 두꺼운 아일랜드 머리통에 어떻게 이해시켜야 할까요?

translation.en: You're not gonna get paid for this job unless that senile old bitch is happy.
translation.ko: 저 노망난 할망구가 만족하기 전엔 어차피 돈 못 받으니까

translation.en: So whoever's driveway you've got to tarmac can fucking wait, comprende?
translation.ko: 누구 도로를 타맥으로 덮든 기다리라 해요, 알겠어요?

translation.en: You listen to me, you ferrety-looking cunt.
translation.ko: 내 말 잘 들어 족제비 같은 놈아

translation.en: You speak to me like that again, I'll refit your disgusting yellow teeth.
translation.ko: 나한테 또 그렇게 말하면 네 더러운 누런 이를 다시 맞춰줄 거야, 알겠어?

translation.en: Comprende?
translation.ko: 네 더러운 누런 이를 다시 맞춰줄 거야, 알겠어?

translation.en: Yeah, completely comprende.
Can you please refit the windows, Brendan?
Please?
Yes, I will, Brian.
And, seeing as you asked me so nicely,
I'm only gonna charge you double time for today.
Oh, you're fucking joking.
Yeah. No. Double bubble. Excellent.
Looks like the Eskimos aren't that keen on your ice after all.
translation.ko: 보아하니 에스키모들이 얼음을 마음에 안 들어 하나 보네

translation.en: -Fuck off. -Oh come on, be nice.
Where's that famous charm gone? My winnings, please.
translation.ko: 그 유명한 매력은 어디 가고? 내 상금 부탁합니다

translation.en: Here... You can have your money back.
And another hundred, seeing as how you lost the bet.
You can swivel, mate.
I'm already paying double time to the "I.R.Anus" over there.
translation.ko: 아일랜드 공화국군 머저리한테 오늘 두 배나 준단 말이야

translation.en: Does he know you call him that? Hey, Brendan...
translation.ko: 네가 그렇게 부르는 거 알아? 브렌던 혹시...

translation.en: -All right, here you go. -[Lavender snickers]
-Yum-yum-yum-yum-yum. -Dickhead.
-Daddy! -I come in peace.
Oh, someone's seen fit to grace us with their presence.
Yeah, someone also wants to say sorry for not being around lately.
translation.ko: 요즘 자주 없어서 사과하려는 사람도 왔습니다

translation.en: How are my cheeky little monkeys?
Vincent, you do know I'm 14 years old.
Well, that's handy, because in here I have
translation.ko: 잘됐다, 왜냐하면 나한테 14세용 세르지오 타키니 트레이닝복 상의가 있거든

translation.en: an age 14-sized Sergio Tacchini tracksuit top.
No way. It's not snide gear either. Dad, you're the best.
translation.ko: 말도 안 돼, 가짜도 아니네 아빠가 최고예요!

translation.en: Vincent, that cost a fortune.
No, my love, this cost a fortune.
Ta-da!
Are you fucking kidding me? Is that real mink?
translation.ko: 지금 나랑 망할 장난해? 진짜 밍크야?

translation.en: Unless Liberty's started skinning cats, it is real.
translation.ko: 리버티가 고양이 털을 쓰기 시작한 게 아니라면 진짜지

translation.en: -Look at you. -Oh, it's gorgeous.
Don't worry, Robbie, I haven't forgotten about you, mate.
translation.ko: 걱정하지 마 로비 네 것도 있어

translation.en: [Robbie] Millennium Falcon! Are you fucking kidding me?
-[Sam] Robbie! -That's your fault, that is.
-What's all this in aid of? -I told you. We're in this together.
translation.ko: 갑자기 이게 다 뭐야? 말했잖아, 우린 같이 간다고

translation.en: It's time for us to start enjoying ourselves.
Thank you, Vincent.
Despite what I tell everyone I meet about you, you're actually a lovely man.
translation.ko: 내가 당신에 대해 뭐라고 하든 당신은 사실 사랑스러운 남자야

translation.en: -Hmm. -[Sam] Now... Why don't we get the kids off to bed,
and maybe we can get an early night ourselves?
Oh, God. I know what that means.
[Vincent] Come here.
The kids.
You're going to have to keep that warm for me.
-Shall I get them off to bed? -No, I gotta go out tonight.
translation.ko: 애들 재우고 금방 올게 아니, 나 오늘 나가야 해

translation.en: -What? -I told you,
Saturday night, prime time for sales.
translation.ko: - 뭐라고? - 말했잖아, 토요일 밤은 영업의 황금 시간이라고

translation.en: You've got to be kidding me.
These dead minks don't pay for themselves.
You wanker!
[Vincent] Never let it be said that I wasn't a generous man.
translation.ko: 제가 통이 크지 않은 남자란 말은 서운합니다

translation.en: Especially when it came to spending Walshy's money.
translation.ko: 특히 월시의 돈을 쓰는 데 있어서는 말이죠

translation.en: It was time to give the boys their Saturday night treat.
translation.ko: 직원들에게 토요일 밤 파티를 열어 줄 때가 온 겁니다

translation.en: You know what makes us different to the rest of the plebs in this town?
translation.ko: 우리가 이 동네의 평민들과 뭐가 다른지 알아?

translation.en: It's simply this.
We will not take no for an answer.
You know, every time we knock on a door,
and some knob tells us he doesn't need new windows,
translation.ko: 어떤 바보가 창문 필요 없다고 할 때마다

translation.en: we're gonna sell that prick more windows
translation.ko: 우리는 그 자식 벽에 있는 창문 구멍보다 더 많은 창문을 파는 거야

translation.en: than he's got holes in his fucking walls for.
translation.ko: 창문 구멍보다 더 많은 창문을 파는 거야

translation.en: -Fucking right. -Hear, hear!
So, enjoy the feast, and thank you for a record week.
translation.ko: 그러니 축제를 즐기고 지난주 신기록을 세워줘서 고맙다

translation.en: Cheers, arseholes.
-Cheers, boss. -Vincent.
[Lavender] Listen, let's hit a club later, yeah?
We can't sit around here all night with just Brian's monster knob for company.
translation.ko: 밤새 여기서 브라이언의 괴물 거시기랑 같이 죽치고 있을 순 없잖아

translation.en: You might want to wait and see what's for dessert first.
translation.ko: 뭐가 후식으로 준비되어 있는지 기다려 보는 게 나을걸

translation.en: -Oh, bloody hell. -Oh, my God.
-Blimey. -Hey, boys.
I fucking love this job!
I've been terribly good this month, yeah.
Pull the blinds, Brian.
Cheers.
♪ Only came outside ♪
